bibl.title: Mallocouria and Therapeuteria: Rituals of Transition in a Mixed Society?
bibl.note: The social functions of three private festivals: the epicrisis and the mallocouria for adolescent boys, and the therapeuteria for unmarried girls.
bibl.seg: MONTSERRAT Dominic, Mallocouria and Therapeuteria: Rituals of Transition in a Mixed Society?
The social functions of three private festivals: the epicrisis and the mallocouria for adolescent boys, and the therapeuteria for unmarried girls.
